Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33007239]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:inhibition of virus production in Vero E6 cells(IC50=0.057	 µM).[Ref.31683742]Virus:Zika virus (ZIKV):inhibition of virus release in Vero cells(IC50=18.59 µM);Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of virus release in BHK-21 cells(IC50=19.91 µM).[Ref.23617302]Virus:Hepatitis B virus (HBV):Inhibition of HBeAg secretion in HepG2.2.15 cells(26±11% inhibition at 20 µM,21±13% Inhibition at 100 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: CMK blocks virus entry, but it further suppresses cleavage of spikes and the syncytium.
